title: Joel Gott Wine Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, May 21, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a tasting featuring the approachable and fruit-driven wines of Joel Gott. From Pinot Noir to Zinfandel and Rosé, this lineup highlights the versatility and value of one of California’s most consistent producers.

Tasting Fee: $20 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

  • Joel Gott Santa Barbara Pinot Noir 2020 – Ripe dark cherry, plum, and raspberry with baking spice and soft, velvety tannins on a long, elegant finish.
  • Joel Gott Paso Robles Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – Plush and medium-bodied with black cherry, cedar, and spice, supported by firm acidity.
  • Joel Gott California Zinfandel 2022 – Rich and smooth with blackberry, raspberry, black plum, and hints of vanilla and spice.
  • Joel Gott Palisades Red Wine – Brambleberry, cherry, and plum with blue fruit, cola, and spice on a delicate, balanced finish.
  • Joel Gott Rosé 2022 – 90 pts, Wine Enthusiast. Bright and refreshing with strawberry, melon, citrus, and crisp acidity.

Come enjoy this easy-drinking, crowd-pleasing lineup—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
